properties.areaDesc: Lamar, TX; Delta, TX; Hopkins, TX
properties.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 10 at 6:04PM CST until January 10 at 6:45PM CST by NWS Fort Worth TX
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a

* Tornado Warning for...
Northern Hopkins County in north central Texas...
Southeastern Lamar County in north central Texas...
Delta County in north central Texas...

* Until 645 PM CST.

* At 604 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado
was located near Commerce, moving northeast at 50 mph.

HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail.

SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.

IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without
shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed.
Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur.  Tree
damage is likely.

* This dangerous storm will be near...
Cooper, Cooper Lake Park Doctors Creek and Cooper Lake Park South
Sulphur around 615 PM CST.
Deport around 645 PM CST.

Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Tira.
properties.instruction:
TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile
home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and
protect yourself from flying debris.

CMAMtext: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 6:45 PM CST. Take shelter now. Check media.
